data.name: Error_HOME_JobNotChosen
data.value: Please remember to choose which job you want to submit time for before clicking on 'Create Timesheet'

data.name: Error_HISTORY_EndDateBeforeStart
data.value: The specified End Date cannot occur before the specified Start Date. Please try again.

data.name: Error_HISTORY_InvalidEndDate
data.value: Please enter a valid End Date.

data.name: Error_HISTORY_InvalidStartDate
data.value: Please enter a valid Start Date.

data.name: Note_TSFullTime_JawsUsers
data.value: A note to JAWS Users: To make this page easier to read and understand using the JAWS software, please go to JAWS settings and turn on what's called the“Abbreviation Expand” setting. Here is how: 1. Go to the JAWS Verbosity dialog by pressing Insert and the letter V. 2. Expand the "Text Options" 3. Select "Abbreviations Expand" 4. Press spacebar to toggle it on if it isn't already.

data.name: Error_TSFullTime_InvalidHours
data.value: You must enter a valid value for 'Hours'.

data.name: Error_TIMESHEET_InvalidTSID
data.value: The timesheet ID is invalid.

data.name: Error_TIMESHEET_NotOwner
data.value: You can only edit your own timesheets.

data.name: Error_TIMESHEET_TSIDNotFound
data.value: The Timesheet ID requested was not found.

data.name: Error_CALENDAR_InvalidDate
data.value: Please enter a valid date.

data.value: Please enter hours that are greater than 0 and less than or equal to 24.

data.name: Error_TSFullTime_InvalidHours_NonNumeric
data.value: Please enter a number.

data.name: Error_TimeEntry_EndBeforeStart
data.value: The End Time cannot occur before the Start Time.

data.name: Error_TimeEntry_MealExceedsShift
data.value: Your work hours must be greater than the meal time.

data.name: Error_TimeEntry_StartEqualsEnd
data.value: The Start and End times cannot be the same.

data.name: Error_TSFullTime_InvalidHours_Decimal
data.value: You can't have more than two numbers after the decimal point.

data.name: Error_TIMESHEET_NotEditable
data.value: You don't have permission to edit this timesheet.

data.name: Error_TimeEntry_OverlappingEntry
data.value: The times entered overlap with existing entries on this timesheet or another timesheet for the same pay period.

data.name: Error_TSFulltime_InvalidOTSplit
data.value: The split of overtime does not add up to the total acrued overtime.

data.name: Error_TSFullTime_24HoursExceeded
data.value: You cannot have more than 24 hours of leave for a single day.

data.name: Error_TSFullTime_BalanceExceeded
data.value: This selection exceeds your available balance (including timesheets not yet processed by payroll).

data.name: Error_TSFullTime_VacationBeforeComp
data.value: You must use your compensatory (comp.) time before using your vacation.

data.name: Error_TSParttime_InvalidAllocationText
data.value: ' is not a valid budget allocation amount.

data.name: Error_TSParttime_InvalidEntryAllocation
data.value: budget allocation amounts do not equal the total hours earned for the entry.

data.name: Error_TSParttime_InvalidTimesheetAllocation
data.value: Budget allocation amounts do not equal the total hours earned for this timesheet.

data.name: Error_TSParttime_PercentAllocationMustBeWholeNumber
data.value: Budget allocation amounts specified using percents must be in whole numbers.

data.name: Error_TIMESHEET_EmptyTimesheet
data.value: You cannot submit an empty timesheet.

data.name: Error_TSParttime_MealBreakNotAllowed
data.value: A meal break cannot be claimed on shifts less than 5 hours.

data.value: Search Timesheets, Time and Leave Reporting

data.name: Error_TSFullTime_InvalidCompTimeUpdate
data.value: Compensatory (comp.) time entries may not be deleted or reduced while unprocessed vacation entries exist.

data.value: Work schedules are limited to 40 hours per week.

data.name: Error_SEARCHTIMESHEETS_DateNeededToSearch
data.value: You must select at least one valid (m/d/yyyy) date to search (if no employee is selected).

data.value: The Start Date cannot occur before the End Date.

data.name: Error_SEARCHTIMESHEETS_StatusNeeded
data.value: You must select at least one status to search.

data.name: Error_TSFullTime_InvalidOTPrecision
data.value: Overtime values are limited to two decimal places.

data.name: Error_TSFullTime_InvalidOTValue
data.value: Overtime values must be numeric.

data.name: Error_UpdateTimesheet_InvalidBudgetNumber
data.value: Budget numbers must be 14 characters in length and only contain numbers and letters.

data.name: Error_UpdateTimesheet_InvalidPayRate
data.value: Pay Rate must be specified as a number with no more than two decimal places.

data.name: Error_UpdateTimesheet_InvalidTimesheetID
data.value: Invalid Timesheet ID.

data.value: Every timesheet must have at least one budget.

data.value: Budget number successfully added to this timesheet.

data.value: The supervisor for this timesheet has been successfully updated.

data.value: You do not have permission to view this timesheet.

data.value: No records were found for the selected pay period. No file was generated.

data.value: You need to access this page using the links in this site's menu.

data.value: An unknown error has occurred. The appropriate personnel have been notified with the technical details of this error.

data.name: Success_FileUpload_UploadComplete
data.value: File generation successful. File name:

data.name: Error_TSFulltime_PositiveTimeWeekLimitExceeded
data.value: Positive time ('W') reporting is limited to 40 hours per week.

data.name: Email_TimesheetRejected_EmployeeNotification
data.value:
Time and Leave Reporting Notification

#Subject#Your timesheet was rejected#/Subject#

#EMPLOYEEFIRSTNAME#,

Your timesheet for #BEGINDATE# - #ENDDATE# was rejected. Please go to #APP_URL#/default.aspx?TimesheetID=#TIMESHEETID# to view the details.



[Note: Please do not reply to this email - it is not a monitored account. For questions, please call the Payroll Office.]

data.name: Email_TimesheetRejected_SupervisorNotification
data.value:
Time and Leave Reporting Notification

#Subject#Timesheet rejected#/Subject#

#SUPERVISORFIRSTNAME#,

#EMPLOYEEFIRSTNAME# #EMPLOYEELASTNAME# had their timesheet for #BEGINDATE# - #ENDDATE# rejected. Please go to #APP_URL#/default.aspx?TimesheetID=#TIMESHEETID# to view the details.



[Note: Please do not reply to this email - it is not a monitored account. For questions, please call the Payroll Office.]

data.name: Email_WorkScheduleUpdated_NotifySupervisor
data.value:
Time and Leave Reporting Notification

#Subject# #EMPLOYEEFIRSTNAME# #EMPLOYEELASTNAME# has submitted his/her work schedule #/Subject#


#EMPLOYEEFIRSTNAME# #EMPLOYEELASTNAME# has updated his/her work schedule:
#WORKSCHEDULE#
To view all of your employees’ work schedules and more please go to #APP_URL#/SearchEmployees.aspx to view the details.



[Note: Please do not reply to this email - it is not a monitored account. For questions, please call the Payroll Office.]

data.name: Error_Timesheet_CannotProcessFuture
data.value: Timesheets for future pay periods cannot be processed.

data.name: Error_LOGIN_InactiveEmployee
data.value: Only active employees are allowed to access this site.

data.name: Error_WorkSchedule_OverlappingEntry
data.value: The times entered overlap with existing entries on your work schedule.

data.name: Error_TSFullTime_RemarkRequired
data.value: You have entered a leave type which requires a remark before submitting your timesheet.

data.name: PageTitle_DELEGATION
data.value: Delegation, Time and Leave Reporting

data.name: Email_TimesheetSubmitted_SupervisorNotification
data.value:
Time and Leave Reporting Notification

#Subject#New timesheet submitted for your approval#/Subject#

#SUPERVISORFIRSTNAME#,

#EMPLOYEEFIRSTNAME# #EMPLOYEELASTNAME# has submitted a timesheet for #BEGINDATE# - #ENDDATE#. Please go to #APP_URL#/default.aspx?TimesheetID=#TIMESHEETID# to approve that timesheet.



[Note: Please do not reply to this email - it is not a monitored account. For questions, please call the Payroll Office.]
